title: Marketing Strategy
introTitle: Retain, Attract & Drive, Strategies that Deliver
introDescription: A growth marketing strategy is essential for your Web3 project seeking scalability and sustainable growth. We help prioritise effective tactics through data-driven improvements and targeted campaigns to achieve your business goals, such as attracting new customers, retaining current ones, and driving revenue growth.
processDescription: The process of creating your marketing strategy will vary depending on your specific goals and needs, however these are some of the steps you can expect us to take:

processList.label: Defining Business Goals
processList.text: Our team will clearly list and define your project’s business goals and objectives, including identifying specific targets and key performance indicators that will be used to measure success.

processList.label: Marketing Audit
processList.text: We will conduct a thorough marketing audit to identify areas of improvement, including analysing current marketing efforts, identifying strengths and weaknesses, and identifying opportunities for growth.

processList.label: Understanding Target Audience
processList.text: In the following step, we will understand the demographics, behavioural patterns, and pain points of our project's target audience, which will include conducting market research and analysis to gather this information.

processList.label: Analysing Competition
processList.text: We will analyse the competition, including identifying the strengths and weaknesses of other projects in your project’s space and understanding their marketing strategies.

processList.label: Strategic Development
processList.text: Our team will develop a customised marketing strategy tailored to your business, including identifying the most effective tactics and channels to reach your target audience and achieve your project’s business goals.

processList.label: Execution
processList.text: We then will proceed with executing the chosen tactics and channels in the strategy, including creating a detailed action plan and assigning specific tasks and responsibilities to team members.

processList.label: Getting Results
processList.text: Our team will continuously measure and analyse results for strategy optimisation, including tracking key performance indicators, identifying areas of success and areas that need improvement, and making adjustments to the strategy as needed.
